title: I want to use the Export ChatGPT Plugin but it says "Can't read or change data on this site". What can I do?
content: I want to export my chats in Markdown and I don't like how bloated Superpower GPT is, I just need to download chats. I wonder if this has to do with the [relatively new addon domain restrictions feature](https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/addons-restricted-domains). I followed the instructions on that page to set `extensions.webextensions.addons-restricted-domains@mozilla.com.disabled` to `true` in about:config. The addon still doesn't work after restarting Firefox.
creator: Oneechan69

title: tabs under address bar
content: Firefox used to have an option to put tabs back under the address bar, it is missing. I don't want to mess with custom css files every update when mozilla breaks things again.
creator: mobiuspoint

title: Retrieving previous session from dead MacBook Pro
content: MacBook Pro (2015) just died. So many crucial tabs that I always save by restoring previous session. Any way to retrieve this??? Does it live somewhere online or in the bowels of the hard drive available for extraction???

title: popups on the right side of my screen is annoying and gets in the way of my work.  How do I get rid of them.
content: I keep getting firefox popups on the right side of my screen, that prevents me from accessing my work. How do I get rid of these annoying popups?
creator: highndrycp2

title: Clicking Firefox Icon in Taskbar Does Not Switch to Program
content:
When I have Firefox minimized (with several tabs) and I click on its icon in the taskbar, FF does not immediately open, but little icons for each of the FF tabs show and I have to choose one of the tabs before FF fully opens. This is very annoying. If the program were to fully open, the one tab I was recently using would open and I could continue with my work. Is there any way to make FF fully open when I click on the FF icon in the taskbar? I am using FF 118.0 (64 bit) in Windows 11. Thanks for your help. Jerry

PS: the icon below shows what happens when I am clicking the FF icon and shows the two tabs open in FF.
creator: HarryJarr

title: Unable to connect to yahoo.com after update to 118.0
content:
Hello.

I'm using Firefox on windows 11 home 22H2. After the recent update to 118.0 I've been unable to load yahoo.com.

I tried the following: Disabled addons Disabled firewall Restarted firefox Restarted computer Restarted firefox in troubleshoot mode

I'm out of ideas except for a downgrade maybe.

Does anyone have any suggestions?

Regards, Klaas
creator: k.damstra

title: why is Firefox getting a request to close Firefox to open a link from Facebook and from Thunderbird and Betterbird
content: Right click on any link in Facebook asks for me to shutdown Firefox to open a new page. What is causing this? The same thing happens if I am in Thunderbird or Betterbird. It's OK to open a new tab but not restart Firefox.
creator: bmazak
